movie.title: Mandela and de Klerk
movie.plot: Sidney Poitier and Michael Caine both received Emmy nominations for their performances in this made-for-TV movie. The plot follows Nelson Mandela's 27-year struggle to end apartheid.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 10 nominations.
